turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get a coffee from Peet's for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, which spot is that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The on on M Street. Ready for the address to plug into your phone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 3299 M St NW, Washington, DC 20007

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What about the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Double shot of espresso. Don't get any cream or sugar or anything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Use my rewards number to pay for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that the one you wrote on the sticky note from last time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have the number in that case.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me know when you get it. So I can start heading downstairs

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Already on my way.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Your quick!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I was already out of the office to stretch my legs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just take the credit for being incredibly fast.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just waiting to pick it up now at the M Street Peet's. I used your rewards number and told them to send the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sweet thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Double shot of espresso comin' right up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meet you downstairs in a few, Than you. Bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you in a few.
